subject: Soccer
Discrimination
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Blacks
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: As Jozy Altidore of the national soccer team prepared for World Cup qualifying matches that begin on Friday, he also talked about fighting racism in the world game.
snippet: As Jozy Altidore of the national soccer team prepared for World Cup qualifying matches that begin on Friday, he also talked about fighting racism in the world game.
